text: Betty Ang is a Filipina businesswoman of Chinese descent, the founder and president of Monde Nissin, one of the largest food manufacturers in the Philippines, and the country's leading producer of biscuits and noodles. == Biography == In 2015, Monde Nissin bought Quorn for £550 million. Little is known about her or her husband, Hoediono Kweefanus, and Monde Nissin does not publish who is on its nine-member board of directors. Monde Nissin is mostly owned by her husband's extended Indonesian family, and they also own Khong Guan Biscuit Factory Indonesia. In August 2017, their net worth was estimated at US$880 million. Ang is married to Hoediono Kweefanus, and they have six children. ==References== Category:Filipino company founders Category:Filipino people of Chinese descent Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Betty Ang
